message:
Training targets human trafficking in Rocky Mount. North Carolina is listed in the top 10 states in the nation in regard to instances of human trafficking. A few of the speakers included Sgt. Michael Hardin, head of the Fayetteville Police Department’s Human Trafficking Unit, retired Maj. Rick Hoffman of the Raleigh Police Department, and Kiricka Yarbrough Smith of the North Carolina Council for Women.  #leo #makingadifference #endhumantrafficking 
https://buff.ly/2NwvnTq
